description: Providing a service that monitors the use of the ENERGY STARo2014 brand (name and marks) in online marketplaces across Canada. Monitoring efforts should focus on the most visible sites, such as largescale retailers as well as known targets identified by NRCan to ensure protection of the ENERGYSTARo2014 brand. The service should identify instances of misuse of the ENERGY STARo2014 brand or marks, such as the ENERGY STARo2014 certification mark on uncertified products.
full_summary:
=====================================================

### ENERGY STAR Brand Monitoring

#### Reference and Solicitation Information

| Field          | Value                                   |
|----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| Reference Number| cb-167-86750882                        |
| Amendment Number| 9                                      |
| Solicitation Number| 5000072745-D                           |
| Publication Date| 2023-11-28                              |
| Tender Closing Date| 2024-01-18T14:00:00                     |

#### Tender Status

The tender for ENERGY STAR brand monitoring services is now expired.

#### Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (English) / Demande de propositions (French)
* Description: The services should monitor the use of the ENERGY STAR brand (name and marks) in online marketplaces across Canada.
* Contracting Entity: Natural Resources Canada
* End User Entity: None

#### Attachment
